bibl.title: The Wandering Personnel of the Temple of Narmuthis in the Faiyum and Some Toponyms of the Meris of Polemon.
Life in a Multi-Cultural Society: Egypt from Cambyses to Constantine and Beyond
bibl.author: GALLO, Paolo

bibl.note: Quelques documents des archives de Narmouthis (IIe s. p.C.) semblent indiquer que le clergé de Narmouthis se chargeait d'accomplir les rites dans les sanctuaires du voisinage. - Pp. 123-129: relevé de toponymes mentionnés dans les archives (mérides de Polémôn et de Thémistos).
GALLO Paolo, The Wandering Personnel of the Temple of Narmuthis in the Faiyum and Some Toponyms of the Meris of Polemon.
Janet H. JOHNSON (Ed.), Life in a Multi-Cultural Society: Egypt from Cambyses to Constantine and Beyond = SAOC. 51 (Chicago, 1992) pp. 119-131, 4 fac-sim.
